name: HELLO WORLD (PhilSmy)
description:
Hello World is an endless runner showcasing a journey through internet since it’s beginnings.

Play through a highly visual experience through the 80s, going to the 90s and then finally the 00s!

Highly challenging gameplay matched with a killer aesthetic! 

Avoid 1s and 0s, crash through the firewall to continue.

Up and Down Arrows to move.
